Top-3 Similar Questions: au_735718: USB headphones get muted when setting volume below a certain threshold
Top-3 Scripts:
au_735718: [Element PCM]
switch = mute
volume = merge
override-map.1 = all 
override-map.2 = all-left,all-right

[Element PCM]
switch = mute
volume = ignore
volume-limit = 0.01
override-map.1 = all 
override-map.2 = all-left,all-right

Explanations about Options.-d:
Select the audio interface backend. The current list of supported backends is:
 alsa, coreaudio, dummy, freebob, oss sun and portaudio. They are not all available
 on all platforms. All backend-parameters are optional.
